result.name: firearms-database
result.notes: Contains details of all those who have applied for and have been granted section 5 authority to possess prohibited weapons.

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: Firearms database

extras.value: Data would not be published both for security reasons (ie the weapons are the most dangerous kind available) and for personal privacy issues (names/addresses of firearms dealers etc are listed).
